channel.title: Plz help me port forward.im stuck!i might make u admin
channel.description:
i found my router and model no when i click it asks for a static ip. it say something like this 192.168.0. then a box.wat do i enter.then wats the next step. i need a PROPER GUIDE. tell me frm start to finish.
who ever one works i make dem a admin.
i have a no-ip,downloaded it,do i need to tick da box near the face,i have a source and jdk2 but i havent port forwarded.thats y mopar is saying its offline when runserver.bat is running
remember.u will b admin.if u help[br][size=1]Posted on: July 26, 2007, 05:04:12 PM[/size][hr]help me plz[br][size=1]Posted on: July 26, 2007, 05:11:17 PM[/size][hr]some1 must knw [br][size=1]Posted on: July 26, 2007, 05:13:00 PM[/size][hr]anyone knw!!!!
some1 must knw ffs

item.title: Plz help me port forward.im stuck!i might make u admin
item.dc:creator: @Jvscape_owner Jvscape owner
item.description:
@Jvscape_owner wrote:

as i posted in your other topic …

ok first off do you have your routers password? if you do go to:

Step one:
start menu > control panel > network connections > right click on your networkstatus > support (copy the default gateway)

Step two:
Then go to the web browser you use and type in the default gateway

Step three:
After that type your routers username and password
Click gaming applications put your port in there and name enable it and dont forget to use both the TCP and the other one
if these settings didn’t work for you use this website

http://www.portforward.com

You may need to make a static ip (it tells you on the website how to if it doesn’t work without it)
NOTE: THIS IS FROM AFTER YOU ALLOWED ALL THE PATHS/EXCEPTIONS!

Hope this helped you if you want me to tell you how to make the exceptions and stuff post here

Read full topic
